name: trello-clone
description: This project allows you to sync a subset of cards from one board to another.

SESSION_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

LIMIT_MAX_CONCURRENT.description: Maximum number of in-flight requests to the Trello API at a given time

LIMIT_MIN_TIME_MS.description: Milliseconds to wait between sending requests to the Trello API
